controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.GameController

  • public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
    Controller for the game.
    Author:
    Alex Addeo, Zion Aranda, Katie Black, Michael Cisternino, Nick Hoffman

        Parameters:

      • update

        public void update()
        Updates the game. Updates the character. Updates each block, interactive object, thrown item, and item. Updates the status bar. If an item is thrown, the corresponding counter is decremented. An item is created with the thrown velocity. If the player attempts to throw and item they don't have, a message is printed.
